channel.title: Slow Internet Research
channel.description: Research reports and findings from the Slow Internet project

item.title: Networks of New York
item.description: By Ingrid Burrington, network member. Exploring the physical infrastructure of networks in New York.

item.title: Getting Into Fights With Data Centers
item.description: By Anne Pasek, network member. Examining conflicts and power dynamics around data center infrastructure.

item.title: Data Center Decenter
item.description: An ongoing project exploring alternative approaches to centralized data infrastructure.

item.title: Tracing The Line: Promissory Politics
item.description: By FICTILIS, network member. Investigating the promises and politics of climate change infrastructure.

item.title: Failing Regularly: on technology's promises
item.description: An in-progress research project examining the failures and broken promises of technology infrastructure. Subscribe for updates.
